title: Saharanpur Spice Box — Small
description: Hand-carved Sheesham spice box with four compartments. Natural oil finish highlights the grain. Small and compact for modern kitchens.

title: Moradabad Forged Trivet
description: Hand-forged brass trivet, corrosion-resistant finish. Minimal geometric design to pair with modern cookware.

title: Lumeza Serving Board — Mixed Wood
description: Large serving and chopping board with hand-sanded edges and food-safe oil finish.

title: Industrial Metal Vase — Short
description: Low-profile forged metal vase with brushed finish — pairs with dried flowers and modern interiors.

title: Minimal Side Table — Wood + Metal
description: Compact side table with solid wood top and slim welded legs — industrial luxe for small spaces.

title: Leather + Brass Keychain
description: Hand-stitched leather keychain with brass hardware — a small, thoughtful Lumeza piece.
